document.text:
From: 'a' 
To:'
Subject: FW: CONFIDENTIAL 
Date: Sun, 07 Jul 2019 00:37:35 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
From: Martin G. Weinberg < 
Sent: Saturday, July 6, 2019 8:31 PM 
To: 
Cc: 'Martin Weinberg' <> 
Subject: CONFIDENTIAL 
please send a copy of the sealed Indictment of Mr. Epstein to this email address. I will maintain its 
confidentiality. 
I would also request a copy of any Warrant that has or will be issued to search Mr. Epstein's residence or property and at 
the conclusion of any such search the Inventory/s. As I stated, he has been actively legally represented by myself and a 
number of other attorneys so to the extent there are any seizures of documents, electronic devices, computers, phones I 
would request again that there be no review of their contents until we can discuss meaningful ways to protect the 
privileged communications that such documents, devices, computers, phones would contain. 
Thank you. 
Marty 
Martin G. Weinberg, Esq. 
20 Park Plaza 
Boston, 
MA 02116 
 This Electronic Message contains information from the Law Office 
of Martin G. Weinberg, P.C., and may be privileged. The information is intended for the use of the addressee 
only. If you are not the addressee, please note that any disclosure, copying, distribution, or use of the contents 
of this message is prohibited. 
EFTA00015567
